Maintenance: Inspect, clean and replace if damaged.
Inspect, clean debris with compressed air
Inspect yellow gear: compressed air if dusty, replace if gear worn

Printer part: Y-axis and Z-axis linear rods and bearings

Do every (non-ABS): 3 months or when changing filament type
Do every (ABS): 3 months or when changing filament type

Maintenance: Inspect: replace if dull or deformed

Do every (non-ABS): Every 720 hours (30 full days) of print time
Do every (ABS): Every 720 hours (30 full days) of print time
